msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 4171; 4910

condition.ab: Regularly cut at the left and right hand sides; the column is broken at the top; the bottom is badly damaged. Some lacunae are at the left of the column and break at the middle and after the payments as a result of vertical folds. A lacuna at the top of the column to the left has the same pattern of 124 and 126. Kollesis is at the end of the column. No restoration is needed. (MA)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. In a few cases of this column the scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the taxpayer.

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.
